page.title: 09COMMUNICATIONS IN BURNHAM
page.content: {Post and Telephone Services} Burnham Market is in the Peterborough postal area, postcode PE31. In the Sutton Estate area the post is delivered by a post-lady on a bicycle; there are two deliveries a day. The farms have a country postal service consisting of one delivery a day by van. The three post boxes in the area have two collections a day. The Burnham Market telephone exchange has been incorporated with that of Fakenham: all numbers are now Fakenham numbers commencing with 738. { Newspapers National newspapers, the Eastern Daily Press (printed in Norwich), the twice-weekly King's Lynn News and Advertiser, the weekly Fakenham and Dereham Times, two free weekly papers and the monthly village newsletter are available in the village
